frame.name: Precipitation
frame.definition:
<def-root>Water in some solid or liquid form (the <fen>Precipitation</fen>) falls from the sky at a particular <fen>Place</fen> and <fen>Time</fen>, lasting for a particular <fen>Duration</fen>. The <fen>Rate</fen> or <fen>Quantity</fen> of precipitation may also be indicated.
<ex>It <t>rained</t> <fex name="Place">in Berkeley</fex> <fex name="Time">yesterday</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Precipitation
FE.definition: <def-root>The water in liquid or solid form that falls from the sky is the Precipitation. This FE is incorporated in many LUs in this frame.</def-root>

FE.name: Rate
FE.definition: <def-root>The Quantity of Precipitation that falls within a certain Duration. <ex>It <t>rains</t> <fex name="Rate">only half an inch per year</fex> around here.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Quantity
FE.definition: <def-root>The Quantity is the amount of Precipitation that has fallen in a precipitation event or events. It is usually measured as the height that the Precipitation attains if prevented from further movement. <ex>It <t>rained</t> <fex name="Quantity">six inches</fex> last night.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>The amount of time for which the precipitation event lasts.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>When the event occurs. <ex>It will probably be <t>raining</t> <fex name="Time">at five o'clock</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fex name="Explanation">Explanation</fex> is the reason for the precipitation event. <ex>It <t>rains</t> <fex name="Explanation">because of high humidity</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>The way in which the precipitation falls. <ex>It <t>drizzled</t> <fex name="Manner">softly</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Temperature
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the temperature of the precipitation. <ex>I was standing in the <fex name="Temperature">cool</fex> <t>drizzle</t>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Frequency
FE.definition: <def-root>This frame element is defined as the number of times an event occurs per some unit of time. </def-root>

lexUnit.name: sneeuw.n
lexUnit.definition: die als witte vlokken uit de lucht komen vallen

lexUnit.name: motregen.n
lexUnit.definition: die bestaat uit heel kleine druppeltjes

lexUnit.name: drop.n
lexUnit.definition: dat o.a. uit zoethout is gemaakt en dat meestal zwart is

lexUnit.name: gijzelen.v
lexUnit.definition: de genoemde gevangen houden en dreigen hem of haar iets te doen om anderen eisen af te dwingen
